p:
A Tracer 653 Assay (Molecular Targeting Technology, Inc) was performed as previously described
36 . Briefly, 100 μl tracer solution was injected (i.v) into each mouse, and the tracer solution that entered the joints was quantified using the IVIS. Regions of interest were drawn using Living Image 3.0 software, and average radiance [Log 10(p/s/cm 2/sr)/(μW/cm 2)] was determined.
